title: Which is more efficient (Hextech Mystery Champion Shard)
body: I've been at the point where I need to buy only 4800 champs and 6300 and I don't mind which champions I get next. Now I'm not sure what is best to do; buy 3 champion shards and reroll them or buy all 4800 champs and then start rerolling to get 6300 champs. Due to Shards only costing 1700 if I get 3 shards its 5100, so just over 4800 but I also need 6300 champs so mathematically can somebody tell me which would be more efficient to do please. I currently need 11 6300 champs and 10 4800 champs. So I'm puzzled on what to do. Someone do the maths for me please.
